verses.verse: Now there <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>, Cornelius <S%G2883><s%> by name <S%G3686><s%>, a centurion <S%G1543><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the band <S%G4686><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> the Italian band <S%G2483><s%>,

a devout <S%G2152><s%> man <S%G2532><s%>, and one that feared <S%G5399><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, who <S%G5037><s%> gave <S%G4160><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> to the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> prayed <S%G1189><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G1275><s%>.

He saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a vision <S%G3705><s%> openly <S%G5320><s%>, as it were about <S%G5616><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> of the day <S%G2250><s%>, an angel <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> coming in <S%G1525><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Cornelius <S%G2883><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G816><s%>, fastening his eyes upon him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> affrighted <S%G1719><s%>, said <S%G2036><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Thy <S%G4675><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> are gone up <S%G305><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a memorial <S%G3422><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> men <S%G435><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fetch <S%G3343><s%> one Simon <S%G4613><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1941><s%> surnamed Peter <S%G4074><s%>:

he <S%G3778><s%> lodgeth <S%G3579><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> a tanner <S%G1038><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea side <S%G2281><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> unto him <S%G2883><s%> was departed <S%G565><s%>, he called <S%G5455><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> household-servants <S%G3610><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a devout <S%G2152><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> that waited <S%G4342><s%> on him <S%G846><s%> continually <S%G4342><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> having rehearsed <S%G1834><s%> all <S%G537><s%> things <S%G537><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, he sent <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%>.

Now on <S%G1161><s%> the morrow <S%G1887><s%>, as <S%G1565><s%> they were on their journey <S%G3596><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto the city <S%G4172><s%>, Peter <S%G4074><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the housetop <S%G1430><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%>, about <S%G4012><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> he became <S%G1096><s%> hungry <S%G4361><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> desired <S%G2309><s%> to eat <S%G1089><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> while they <S%G1565><s%> made ready <S%G3903><s%>, he <S%G846><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> a trance <S%G1611><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he beholdeth <S%G2334><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> opened <S%G455><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%>, 1909, 846 as <S%G5613><s%> it were a great <S%G3173><s%> sheet <S%G3607><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> let down <S%G2524><s%> by <S%G1210><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G746><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>:

wherein <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G5225><s%> all manner of <S%G3956><s%> fourfooted beasts <S%G5074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things <S%G2062><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> birds <S%G4071><s%> of the heaven <S%G3772><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G1096><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Rise <S%G450><s%>, Peter <S%G4074><s%>; kill <S%G2380><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Not so <S%G3365><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G5315><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> eaten <S%G5315><s%> anything <S%G3956><s%> that is common <S%G2839><s%> and <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> came unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> again3825, 1537 the second time <S%G1208><s%>, What <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath cleansed <S%G2511><s%>, make <S%G2840><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> common <S%G2840><s%>.
And this <S%G5124><s%> was done1096, Esther9 thrice <S%G5151><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> straightway the vessel <S%G4632><s%> was received up353, 3825 into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G5613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was much perplexed <S%G1280><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> what5101, Leviticus2 the vision <S%G3705><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> might mean <S%G1498><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, the men <S%G435><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were sent <S%G649><s%> by <S%G575><s%> Cornelius <S%G2883><s%>, having made inquiry <S%G1331><s%> for Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s house <S%G3614><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> stood <S%G2186><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the gate <S%G4440><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> and asked <S%G4441><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, were lodging <S%G3579><s%> there <S%G1759><s%>.

And while <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> thought <S%G1760><s%> on <S%G4012><s%> the vision <S%G3705><s%>, the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> said unto <S%G2036><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, three <S%G5140><s%> men <S%G435><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> arise <S%G450><s%>, and get thee down <S%G2597><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, nothing <S%G3367><s%> doubting <S%G1252><s%>: for <S%G1360><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have sent <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the men <S%G435><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%>: what <S%G5101><s%> is the cause <S%G156><s%> wherefore <S%G1223><s%> ye <S%G3739><s%> are come <S%G3918><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Cornelius <S%G2883><s%> a centurion <S%G1543><s%>, a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one that feareth <S%G5399><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> well reported <S%G3140><s%> of by <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the nation <S%G1484><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, was warned of God <S%G5537><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> a holy <S%G40><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> to send for <S%G3343><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>.

So he <S%G1528><s%> called them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1528><s%> and lodged <S%G3579><s%> them <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> on the morrow <S%G1887><s%> he <S%G1528><s%> arose and <S%G2532><s%> went forth with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the brethren <S%G80><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%> accompanied <S%G4905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> on the morrow <S%G1887><s%> they entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> Cornelius <S%G2883><s%> was waiting for <S%G4328><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, having <S%G2258><s%> called together <S%G4779><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kinsmen <S%G4773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his near <S%G316><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when it came to pass <S%G5613><s%> that Peter4074, Genesis96 entered <S%G1525><s%>, Cornelius <S%G2883><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and fell down <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%>, and worshipped him <S%G4352><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1453><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Stand up <S%G450><s%>; I <S%G2504><s%> myself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2504><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> as he talked with <S%G4926><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he went in <S%G1525><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> come together <S%G4905><s%>:

and <S%G5037><s%> he said <S%G5346><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Ye <S%G5210><s%> yourselves know <S%G1987><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> it is an unlawful thing <S%G111><s%> for a man <S%G435><s%> that is <S%G2076><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%> to join himself or <S%G2228><s%> come unto <S%G4334><s%> one of another nation <S%G246><s%>; and yet <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G4334><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> hath God <S%G2316><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> that <S%G1166><s%> I should <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3367><s%> call <S%G3004><s%> any man <S%G444><s%> common <S%G2839><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%>:

wherefore <S%G1352><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G2064><s%> came without gainsaying <S%G369><s%>, when I was sent for <S%G3343><s%>. I ask <S%G4441><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> with what <S%G5101><s%> intent <S%G3056><s%> ye sent for <S%G3343><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Cornelius <S%G2883><s%> said <S%G5346><s%>, Four <S%G5067><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> ago <S%G575><s%>, until <S%G3360><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>, I was <S%G2252><s%> keeping <S%G3522><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> of prayer <S%G4336><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a man <S%G435><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> bright <S%G2986><s%> apparel <S%G2066><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G5346><s%>, Cornelius <S%G2883><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> is heard <S%G1522><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> are had in remembrance <S%G3415><s%> in the sight of <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Send <S%G3992><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> call unto thee <S%G3333><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1941><s%> surnamed Peter <S%G4074><s%>; he <S%G3778><s%> lodgeth <S%G3579><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of <S%G4613><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> a tanner <S%G1038><s%>, by <S%G3844><s%> the sea side <S%G2281><s%>.

Forthwith <S%G1824><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> I sent <S%G3992><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> hast <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> done <S%G4160><s%> that thou <S%G4771><s%> art come <S%G3854><s%>. Now <S%G3568><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> here present <S%G3918><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, to hear <S%G191><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> have been commanded <S%G4367><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> of the Lord <S%G5259><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> his mouth <S%G4750><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Of <S%G1909><s%> a truth <S%G225><s%> I perceive <S%G2638><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> respecter of persons <S%G4381><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that feareth <S%G5399><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worketh <S%G2038><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, is <S%G2076><s%> acceptable <S%G1184><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>.

The word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> unto the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>, preaching <S%G2097><s%> good tidings of peace <S%G1515><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> (He <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%>.) —

that saying <S%G4487><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> yourselves know <S%G1492><s%>, which was published <S%G1096><s%> throughout <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, beginning <S%G756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, after <S%G3326><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> preached <S%G2784><s%>;

even Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%>, how <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> anointed <S%G5548><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%>: who <S%G3739><s%> went about <S%G1330><s%> doing good <S%G2109><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> healing <S%G2390><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were oppressed <S%G2616><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>; whom <S%G3739><s%> also they slew <S%G337><s%>, hanging <S%G2910><s%> him on <S%G1909><s%> a tree <S%G3586><s%>.

Him <S%G5126><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raised up <S%G1453><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to be made <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G1717><s%>,

not <S%G3756><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> unto witnesses <S%G3144><s%> that were chosen before <S%G4401><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, even to us <S%G2254><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> ate <S%G4906><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drank with <S%G4844><s%> him <S%G846><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> he <S%G846><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he charged <S%G3853><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%> unto the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to testify <S%G1263><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this is <S%G2076><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> ordained <S%G3724><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to be the Judge <S%G2923><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the living and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

To him <S%G5129><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%>, that through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>.
